name: Matching Game Heroes
description:
Matching Game Heroes:

Memory has long been a favorite game for all generations.

It is easy to play, in fact it is so simple that really young children can play with ease.

The object of the game is to collect the most matching pairs.

The player turns over 2 cards and if they match, then this pair disappears

When the player has matched all pairs of cards, he wins the game!

Choose your difficulty level!

Easy - 8 cards

Medium - 12 cards

Hard - 16 cards

Set new records:

The game saves your best scores so you can track your progress!

Download this game, train your memory and enjoy the pleasant atmosphere of the game
